ticker.dx: cos(CUSTOM * pi)*(0.12 + CUSTOM * 0.08) * (min(1, max(0, 1 - max(0, AGE - 12) / (8 + CUSTOM * 12)))) + (CUSTOM*0.075) * cos((0.1 * AGE)) - ((PLAYER_X - POS_X) / (DISTANCE_SQUARED + 1)) * min(max(2 - sqrt(DISTANCE_SQUARED), 0), 1) * 0.25
ticker.dz: sin(CUSTOM * pi)*(0.12 + CUSTOM * 0.08) * (min(1, max(0, 1 - max(0, AGE - 12) / (8 + CUSTOM * 12)))) + (CUSTOM*0.075) * sin((0.1 * AGE)) - ((PLAYER_Z - POS_Z) / (DISTANCE_SQUARED + 1)) * min(max(2 - sqrt(DISTANCE_SQUARED), 0), 1) * 0.25
